argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description:
Indicates whether the modeless dialog box is being resized.
.T. = Is being resized.
.F. = Is not being resized.

page.description: Returns .T. if named dialog is a controlbar whose layout is being determined.
page.discussion: The UI_MODELESS_DLG_SIZING() function returns .T. (TRUE) when a modeless dialog box is in the process of being resized.
page.example: resizing = .f. ui_modeless_dlg_box("self",<<%dlg% {watch=ui_modeless_dlg_sizing("self")!resizer} {stretch=width,height}; [.100,20text]; {stickto=bottom} (resizing) Resizing %dlg%,<<%code% if a_dlg_button = "resizer" then resizing = ui_modeless_dlg_sizing("self") else if a_dlg_button = "" .or. a_dlg_button = "&close" then a_dlg_button = "" ui_modeless_dlg_close("self") end if %code%)
